message.content:
To samu riba ta kuɗi, a yi amfani da wannan bayanin:

1. Kai Rubutu: Ka shiga wannan baƙar na rubutu a cikin shafin samun riba ta kuɗi a cikin abokan ciniki.
2. Baya Rubutu: Ka rubuta abin da aka sauke a cikin rubutu, misali kamar yadda aka rubuta "Samun riba ta kuɗi".
3. Tabbatar da Ayyuka: Bayan ka rubuta abin, ka tabbatar da ayyukan da zaka buɗe a cikin rubutu. Misali, ayyuka kamar "Samun riba ta kuɗi a kan ƙarin watau" ko "Samun riba ta kuɗi a kowane mako".
4. Ƙara Samun Riba: Bayan ka tabbatar da ayyuka, ka ƙara samun riba ta kuɗi. Ka iya samun bayanin daga wasu daga cikin hanyoyin kwayoyi ko bankun riba ta kuɗi da ake buɗe a kan abokan ciniki.
5. Bayanin: Ka fadada bayanin da zaka so a matsayin abin da aka yi a cikin rubutu don samun riba ta kuɗi. Ka yi amfani da hotunan da aka yi a cikin rubutu don bayar da wasu masu sanarwa ko abokan ciniki.

Dole ne kiyi ajiye bayanin da zaka so a matsayin samun riba ta kuɗi a cikin Hausa. I'll be happy to assist you with any further instructions you may need!
